steps.name: I am on the login page
I enter the username "VALID_USERNAME" and password "PASSWORD"
I click button login in login page
I am on homepage landing page and see the title "VALIDATION_TITLE_HOMEPAGE"
I have products as product_name for checkout
I click the add to cart button for the product checkout name on the inventory page
I click cart button for the product on the inventory page
I see the text "Your Cart" in cart page
I click button checkout
I see the text "Checkout: Your Information" in checkout page

elements.name: User do not enters all field in in the checkout form

steps.name: User in checkout page without entering first name "", last name "", postcal code "" in the form
I click button continue
the form should be show validation error message "Error: First Name is required"
